participant_1.background:
I got lost in Tokyo and a kind stranger helped me find my way back to my hotel.
i do not like broccoli.
I like cheeseburgers and doing laundry on weekends.
i like early 2000s indie music.
I eat healthy and exercise regularly to keep my body and mind young.

participant_2.background:
I used to be a singer in a church choir, but I had to quit because of my asthma.
I'm single and happy, and I spend my free time writing short films.
i am in art school.
My family eats healthy, goes for walks, and enjoys the Fourth of July together.
i have lived a very sheltered life.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Great! How about you?
I am doing well, thank you. I was just telling my friend about my trip to Tokyo last weekend.
Oh that sounds like fun! Did you go to any cool restaurants?
Yeah, I went to this one place that had the best cheeseburgers I've ever had.
Wow, that sounds delicious. I love cheeseburgers!
Me too! I also really enjoyed the early 2000s indie music that was playing there.
I've never really listened to that genre of music, but I'm always open to trying new things.
Oh, you should definitely check it out! It's really good.
I will, thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to write short films, and I'm also in art school.
Oh that's cool! I've always wanted to write a short film.
It's a lot of fun! And it's a great way to express yourself creatively.
I bet. I'm not very artistic, but I love watching art films.
Well, I'm sure you're more artistic than you think.
Haha, maybe. I just don't have the patience to draw or paint.
That's okay, there are lots of other ways to be artistic.
Yeah, like writing short films!
Exactly
